text: Ivor Neville "Nick" Kamen (15 April 1962 â€“ 4 May 2021) was an English model, pop singer-songwriter, and musician. He was best known for the singles "Each Time You Break My Heart" from 1986 and "I Promised Myself" from 1990, as well as for appearing in a 1985 Levi's advert. Kamen was born in London. Kamen died on 4 May 2021 in Essex, aged 59. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English pop singers Category:Singer-songwriters from London Category:Musicians from London Category:Models from London
title: Nick Kamen
